name: My Lil Mini Game
description:
A simple platformer game with a twist of billiard and some spice of difficulty and fun. Took screenshots from the snipping tool, the quality of the images may be low.

After failing many times of making a game I always end up quitting in the midway, I usually find myself struggling finding sounds and art, because that's not my area, I'm a programmer so I decided to go for a simple one and I ended up with this. Its a old game that was left behind in a folder, I decided to continue it and finish it, and ye here it is ^_^. You are trying to find a celestial dragon that is frozen in a other world, yes ik I suck when it comes to story  and stuff :P,  The game isn't only a platformer game it has a little mix of billiard in it. There is a surprise at the end! ^_^, and there is some fun stuff in there xd.

Controls:

Use right click to rotate the camera around the scene.

Press C to reset the camera.

Hold B to slowly rumble your ball near to spawn.

Click the player while holding and dragging, release to shoot, you need zig points to shoot. You get 1 zig point for a ball you score.

In platformer after you get player controls, use W A S D and spacebar to move and jump.

In a level, press Esc to go back to menu. ( >_> ) .. now I know you this but still eheheheh.
